text: Maxwell "Max" Lloyd Wiltshire (born 16 July 1938) is an ex-Welsh international rugby union player who played for Aberavon RFC during the 1960s. First capped against the touring All Blacks in 1967 along with fellow Aberavon RFC players, Billy Mainwaring, Ian Hall and Paul James Wheeler he won four Welsh Caps. He captained Aberavon in the 1965/6 & 1966/7 seasons. == References == Category:Aberavon RFC players Category:Vardre RFC players Category:Bridgend RFC players Category:Barbarian F.C. players Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Living people Category:People from Sydney Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Rugby union locks Category:1938 births
title: Max Wiltshire
